summary: Project to support exporting quotes to PDF with a styled layout matching the on-screen quote.
architectural_notes: Use a browser-based PDF export library (e.g., jsPDF or equivalent) to generate styled quote PDFs matching UI layout.

existing_features.title: Update the quote PDF export to generate a styled layout that visually matches the on-screen Quote Summary layout (project information section, items table structure, and a highlighted grand total block) rather than a simple text-only PDF.
Ensure the existing 'Export PDF' action in the Quote Summary screen uses the styled PDF export path and provides a clear user-facing error message if the PDF library is not available at runtime.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate a PDF export library and add a 'Download PDF' for quotes using a styled layout that matches the on-screen quote.

projectName: Use a styled PDF layout for quote export
